wikipedia_page.main: David Howard Burcher (born 26 October 1950) is a former Wales international rugby union player. He was capped four times for Wales in 1977 and that same year he toured New Zealand with the British & Irish Lions, playing in one international. Burcher played club rugby for Newport RFC.

response: *  David Burcher, Wales and British Lions international
